Package allurium.inputs

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractInputElement
    Represents the base class for input elements in the UI, extending UIElement.
    AbstractRequiredTextArea
    Represents an abstract class for a required text area in the UI, extending TextArea.
    AbstractRequiredTextField
    Represents an abstract class for a required text field in the UI, extending TextField.
    CheckBox
    Represents a checkbox element in the UI, extending UIElement.
    DropdownSelect
    Represents a custom dropdown menu that mimics the behavior of a native `
    RadioButton
    Represents a radio button input field in the UI, extending AbstractInputElement.
    Select
    Encapsulates interactions with a select menu (`
    TextArea
    Represents a text area (``) element in the UI, extending TextField.
    TextField
    Represents a text input field in the UI, extending AbstractInputElement.
    UploadField
    Represents an upload field (``) in the UI, extending UIElement.
